objects.text:
• BOLD NACHO CHEESE FLAVOR
• CRUNCHY TRIANGULAR SHAPE
• PERFECT FOR SHARING
• LIMITED TIME DISCOUNT

product_details.name: Doritos Flavored Tortilla Chips, Nacho Cheese, 1.75 Ounce (Pack of 64)
product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and vibrant layout split into four quadrants using distinct color blocks. A large product image (id: `product_image`) dominates the right half, emphasizing the snack's packaging. A prominent header (id: `heading`) sits at the top left in large white font to attract attention alongside a teaser tagline (id: `tagline`) in bright yellow-orange, followed by an engaging subheading (id: `subheading`) reinforcing urgency. Highlighted feature points (id: `description`) detail product benefits in a compact bullet list. A prominent price tag (id: `price`) grabs attention below, supported by a call-to-action button (ids: `cta_background`, `cta`). Decorative SVG shapes in the background add dynamism.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red (#D50000)
- Maroon (#B71C1C)
- Brick Red (#C62828)
- Bright Amber (#FFA000)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#000000)
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image uses a fiery and bold color palette to evoke flavor intensity and excitement. Dominated by a rich red background (#C4161C), this color grabs attention and conveys heat and boldness. The chips themselves are highlighted in bright cheesy orange (#FAA21B) with golden yellow accents (#F9C44D), enhancing their appealing flavor. Black (#0C0C0C) outlines and chunks in the logo provide depth, contrast, and edge, while crisp white (#F4F4F4) text ensures readability and visual pop. Subtle blending is achieved through gradients and shadows, particularly on the chips and backdrop, giving the whole composition a bold, dynamic presence.
